post.author: 박경종
post.content:
1. need a person who is strong in C++/Unix
2. also have some IBM mainframe background OS390 environment
3. Have a good knowledge in Relational DB. i.e. DB2
4. The project is a development using C++/Unix
5. A fulltime, Intermediate/Senior position.

If you are qualified, please contact 'james@w5.net'
post.title: C++/Unix, DB2 in IBM Mainframe evironment
